name: KingReact
description:
For playing on mobile device: 
Click me for the mobile game

How to play: 
- SPACE to JUMP
- LEFT-CLICK to ATTACK
- Avoid pig-bombs, bombs, cannon ball and spike
- Kill pig to activate power up!

Every Pig is a Dead Pig Walking!

THE KING IS BACK!
Armed with his hammer, the king has only one goal: kill every pig that comes along!

DO NOT BECOME FOOD FOR PIGS!
Will the Pig King have no hope and all his descendants will be swept away? They will do everything not to allow you to reach it: bombs, suicide bombers, cannons ....

SUPER KING!
Strengthen the king with the superpowers he has available: Speed, Time Control, Shield, ... Now it's all in your hands, and especially in your diamonds ... you will need it
